title: Video: Washed Out – A Dedication
content: Far and away my favourite track from Washed Out’s 2011 album Within and Without, A Dedication is thoroughly deserving of a stunning video, and Yoonha Park has created just that. Echoing the delicate, ballad inspired atmosphere of the track, it’s ever-so cliched yet in an entirely watchable way. So there’s shots of people jumping into lakes, water running down windowpanes and plenty other ‘deep and meaningful’ clips, but c’mon, everyone likes a bit of self-indulgence once in a while.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
